Issue 51 – December 2010Cover ArtSolitudeRaf is an image creator living and operating in the south of Brazil, where he devotes his life creating pictorial manifestations of his unconscious worlds. In this reality, he creates illustrations for advertising and editorial markets, and delivers concept art for game developers.
